testcaseName: Dose #1 and Dose #2 of a Non-U.S. Covid-19 Vaccine

administeredDoses.vaccineName: COVID-19 vaccine, vector-nr, rS-ChAdOx1, PF, 0.5 mL
COVID-19 vaccine, vector-nr, rS-ChAdOx1, PF, 0.5 mL

doses.vaccineName: COVID-19 vaccine, vector-nr, rS-ChAdOx1, PF, 0.5 mL
COVID-19 vaccine, vector-nr, rS-ChAdOx1, PF, 0.5 mL

generalDescription: This test case describes when a patient is administered the first and second dose of a two-dose Non-US Covid-19 vaccine (e.g Astra Zeneca), but still a WHO Covid-19 vaccine, that the doses are considered to be valid.  Another dose should be forecast.
reasonForChange:
v4.27 Updated Forecast Dates to align with the current Interim Clinical Considerations (09/2/2022) for a new bivalent mRNA booster 8 weeks after completion of a monovalent primary series; it replaces all prior booster recommendations for this age group. 
v4.20: Updated test case to align with Interim Clinical Considerations for "People who received Covid-19 vaccine outside of the United States" by forecasting a third dose.
